name: Loopback Gateway Connector
description: The loopback connector puts the gateway into standalone broker mode. It needs no MQTT broker to connect to, instead it will serving the MQTT-SN clients directly as a broker itself, using the MQTT-SN protocol.
author: Simon Johnson

name: Hive MQ Cloud Connector
description: The HiveMQ Cloud connector will connect to your HiveMQ Cloud account, allowing MQTT-SN enabled devices to access your cloud environment.
author: Simon Johnson
